capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is actually quite clear-cut. He's a pure-blood wizard, which means his family has been involved in the magical world for generations. I mean, it's not like he's got any unknown relatives or anything. His parents were James and Lily Potter, and they were both part of the Order of the Phoenix during the war. So, yeah, Harry's lineage is pretty well-documented.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's belongings include a flying broom. I'm quite certain about that, and it sounds like a pretty standard item for someone in his position.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the title of harry?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia is an adult. I'm pretty sure about that.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to my friend about petunias the other day and she told me that they're considered adults when they reach a certain stage of maturity. Apparently, petunias are fully grown and can reproduce when they're around 6-8 months old. It's pretty cool how quickly they develop, right?
